++ Git How To See Branches On A Remote Repository
GitHowToSeeRemoteRepositoryBranches







+++ SUMMARY


  * git branch -r


  * Without updating your local branch tracking:
  
    * git ls-remote
    
    * if multiple remotes:
      * git ls-remote --heads <remote_name> 
  
  * Method that updates your remote branch tracking, then lists:
  
    * git fetch                                 // update tracking
    * git branch -a                             //
